definitions: To extend one's limbs or body.
To extend over a distance or in a particular direction.
To make something longer or wider by pulling it.
To extend or spread out to a greater or the full length or extent.
To make demands on the capacity or resources of.
examples: She likes to stretch after waking up.
Can you stretch the elastic band?
The cat stretched out on the rug.
The project will stretch our budget.
